title: How to Draw an Anime Paper Doll

steps.title: Draw the character or animal in a simple outfit like a T-shirt and shorts.
steps.content: Draw the character or animal in a simple outfit like a T-shirt and shorts. Be sure the doll isn't too small so that it's almost impossible to cut out.

steps.title: When you are done with the basic doll, slide the other piece of paper on top of the doll.
steps.content: When you are done with the basic doll, slide the other piece of paper on top of the doll. Draw the first outfit on the doll like you would place it on the doll when you are playing.

steps.title: Draw some more outfits for the doll.
steps.content: Draw some more outfits for the doll.

steps.title: Add a unique hairstyle.
steps.content: Add a unique hairstyle. To make the doll even more cool, draw the hair to be distinct and interesting.

steps.title: Color your doll and clothes.
steps.content: Color your doll and clothes. Colored pencils and markers are best because most crayons are too thick to get tiny detail.

steps.title: Touch up your doll by erasing all of the stray pencil marks and smudges.
steps.content: Touch up your doll by erasing all of the stray pencil marks and smudges.

steps.title: Scan your paper doll and give copies to friends or put them on a website.
steps.content: Scan your paper doll and give copies to friends or put them on a website. Or, if you're too impatient to play, cut out the doll, accessories, pets, whatever and have fun!

steps.title: Glue cardboard to the shape of the doll to make it sturdier.
steps.content: Glue cardboard to the shape of the doll to make it sturdier.
